page.title: 11SPORT & RECREATION.
page.content: { Tow Law Town A.F.C. play in the 1st. {Division of the Northern League. Home {games attract many supporters. The new leisure-centre at Willington (5 miles) and the swimming pool at Crook (4 miles) are both within easy reach. { In Tow Law there are allotments which {are looked after by young and old {alike and there are still pigeon crees {on some of them.Older people also meet {to play darts, dominoes, whist, etc. {and there are monthly meetings for the {Mother's Union and the W.I. The Church Lad's/Girl's Brigade meets once a week as do the Brownies and Girl-Guides (a new venture). There is also a Youth Club but the demolition of the Community Centre has stopped many activities.However the new B.M.X. track is very popular.
